content.modules: The following module(s) may need to migrate data:
content.wait: If the system is migrating its own data, please wait before starting

summary.title: Migration Summary
summary.nothing: No document needed to be migrated.

error.actors: An error occured while migrating data for world actors.
error.token: An error occured while migrating data for the token actor {uuid}.
error.users: An error occured while migrating data for users.

setActor.name: Set Persistent Actor
setActor.hint: Set the selected token's actor as persistent.

altTracker.name: Toggle Combat Tracker
altTracker.hint: Toggle the combat tracker menu to show additional options.

filter.name: Use Sidebar Filter
filter.hint: Allow filtering the current sidebar content.

previousShortcutsSet.name: Previous Shortcuts Set
previousShortcutsSet.hint: Change to the previous shortcuts set.

nextShortcutsSet.name: Next Shortcuts Set
nextShortcutsSet.hint: Change to the next shortcuts set.

healthStatus.name: Health Status Entries
healthStatus.hint: Comma separated strings representing the different divisions of a creature's health state from worst to best. Leave empty to disable.
healthStatus.default: Dead, At Death's Door, Not Feeling Good, Seen Better Days, Barely Hurt, Perfectly Fine

partyAsObserved.name: Party Alliance as Observed
partyAsObserved.hint: Consider actors in the 'Party' alliance to be observed by players for the sake of extending the tooltip or showing health details in the combat tracker. Not to be confused with the 'Party' actor.

highestSpeed.name: Show Highest Speed
highestSpeed.hint: If no speed was manually selected, the highest one will always be shown by default even if the land speed isn't 0.

useModifiers.name: Use Modifiers
useModifiers.hint: Display modifiers instead of the difficulty value in the different HUD elements.

onCursor.name: Show on Cursor
onCursor.hint: The module popup will be centered on the cursor when it is first rendered (instead of showing up in the center of the viewport).

fontSize.name: Font Size
fontSize.hint: The popup dynamically scales with the font size. NOTE: The module was designed to use a font size of 14.

closeOnSendToChat.name: Close on Send-to-Chat
closeOnSendToChat.hint: Should the popup be closed when sending an item to chat from the header button.

hideUntrained.name: Hide Untrained
hideUntrained.hint: Should skill actions be hidden from the sidebar if the character isn't proficient with them.

fontSize.name: Font Size
fontSize.hint: The sidebars dynamically scale with the font size. NOTE: The module was designed to use a font size of 14.

multiColumns.name: Multi Columns
multiColumns.hint: When a sidebar's height is bigger than its max-height, it will be split into up to x columns. NOTE: Firefox has a weird quirk of forcing horizontal scrolling when using this feature.

maxHeight.name: Max Height
maxHeight.hint: Sets the sidebars max height as a percentage of the viewport.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Enables this HUD element on your client.

fontSize.name: Font Size
fontSize.hint: The HUD element dynamically scales with the font size. NOTE: The module was designed to use a font size of 14.

showAlliance.name: Alliance Button
showAlliance.hint: Show the alliance/disposition button on the HUD.

type.name: Extended Tooltip
type.hint: If/when the extended version of the tooltip should be used.

showStatus.name: Display Health Status
showStatus.hint: When should the creatures' health state be displayed on the tooltip if enabled in you world.

delay.name: Tooltip Delay
delay.hint: Delay in milliseconds before the tooltip shows up on screen.

position.name: Position
position.hint: Select a preferred side for the tooltip to be displayed, if not possible, the module will try first on the opposite side, otherwise on one of the remaining two.

showDistance.name: Display Distance
showDistance.hint: Will display the distance between the hovered token and one that is inferred automatically.

drawDistance.name: Draw Distance
drawDistance.hint: Draw a line of this thickness between the hovered token and the 'distance' target.

noDead.name: Dead Actor
noDead.hint: What type of tooltip should be displayed when hovering over a dead actor.

scaleDimensions.name: Scale With Token
scaleDimensions.hint: Should the HUD have its dimensions scaled with the token it is attached to instead of having fixed dimensions.

mode.name: Display Mode
mode.hint: Select the mode of display of the token HUD.

closeAllOnCLick.name: Full Close on Click
closeAllOnCLick.hint: When enabled, clicking anywhere on the board will close the HUD entirely. When disabled, it will take you out of any input field or close the sidebar first.

closeOnSpell.name: Close on Spell Cast
closeOnSpell.hint: Should the HUD/sidebar be closed when casting a spell.

closeOnSendToChat.name: Close on Send-to-Chat
closeOnSendToChat.hint: Should the HUD/sidebar be closed when sending an item to chat.

closeOnSkill.name: Close on Skill Roll
closeOnSkill.hint: Should the HUD/sidebar be closed when rolling a skill.

noflash.name: Disable Flash
noflash.hint: Disables the portrait flash effect when selecting a token linked to the currently set persistent actor.

closeOnSkill.name: Close Sidebar on Skill Roll
closeOnSkill.hint: Should the sidebar be closed when rolling a skill.

closeOnSpell.name: Close Sidebar on Spell Cast
closeOnSpell.hint: Should the sidebar be closed when casting a spell.

closeOnSendToChat.name: Close Sidebar on Send-to-Chat
closeOnSendToChat.hint: Should the sidebar be closed when sending an item to chat.

consumableShortcut.name: Consumable Shortcut
consumableShortcut.hint: What clicking on a consumable shortcut should do.

confirmShortcut.name: Confirm Action/Spell Shortcut
confirmShortcut.hint: Should spell and action shortcuts require confirmation before being used.

autoSet.name: Auto-Set Actor
autoSet.hint: Whenever no persistent actor has been set, the currently selected token actor or the current combatant actor will automatically be set as persistent.

keepLast.name: Keep Last Persistent
keepLast.hint: When using 'Auto-Set Actor', should the last valid actor be kept as persistent instead of being unset. It will still revert to your assigned actor if you have one and 'On Token Selection' is chosen.

autoFillNpc.name: Auto-Fill NPCs
autoFillNpc.hint: If you haven't made any manual changes, the shortcut slots will automatically be filled.

autoFillActions.name: Auto-fill Actions
autoFillActions.hint: Should NPC actions that cost 1 to 3 actions be added after the attacks.

autoFillReactions.name: Auto-fill Reactions
autoFillReactions.hint: Should NPC reactions be added after the attacks.

autoFillType.name: Auto-Fill Preference
autoFillType.hint: The priority order for the remaining slots.

ownerShortcuts.name: Use Owner Shortcuts
ownerShortcuts.hint: If you haven't made any manual changes to a character owned actor, its owner shortcuts will be used.

shiftEffects.name: Hold Shift for Effects
shiftEffects.hint: Requires holding the shift key to interact with effect icons.

shortcutSlots.name: Shortcut Slots
shortcutSlots.hint: The number of shortcut slots available. NOTE: The module was designed to have 4 slots.

drawConsumables.name: Must Draw Consumable
drawConsumables.hint: Forces consumables to be carried before being able to use their shortcut. This doesn't affect scrolls that were dragged from the spells, only actual consumable items from the inventory.

started.name: Only When Started
started.hint: The tracker will only show up for players if the combat has actually started (on top of needing a combatant participating).

textureScaling.name: Texture Scaling
textureScaling.hint: Invert scales the combatant's image based on the token texture scaling.

enabled.hint: Enables this HUD element on your client. This is overriden when the 'Player Access' system worldclock setting is disabled.

short.name: Short Date & Time
short.hint: When enabled, a single line with a shortened version of the date & time will be displayed. You can click on the time to toggle between both modes.

resolve.title: Use Resolve Point
resolve.full: {name} is full of stamina and doesn't need to rest.

breather.used: {name} has {ratio} SP and spends a resolve point, taking a 10 minute breather. Stamina Refreshed.

error.selectOne: Select a single NPC/Character token to set as your persistent actor.

menu.setActor: Set selected token as persistent actor

clean.hover: Only show UI when hovering the portrait

shortcut.wrongActor: You can only create shortcuts from the same persistent actor.
shortcut.wrongType: You cannot create a shortcut of that type.
shortcut.wrongOrigin: Only spells from a HUD sidebar can be turned into shortcuts.

confirm.title: Use - {name}
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to use {name}?

draw.title: {type} - {name}
draw.message: Are you sure you want to {type} {name}?

shortcut.noChannelElements: Could not find the Channel Elements action on this character.

delete.title: Reset Shortcuts
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the current shortcuts set for {name}?

fill.title: Auto-Fill Shortcuts
fill.message: Are you sure you want to automatically fill all the shortcuts for {name}?

owner.title: Copy Owner Shortcuts
owner.message: Are you sure you want to copy all the shortcuts sets and their automation from {name}'s owner?
owner.none: This Character doesn't have any owner with shortcuts set.
owner.self: You are trying to copy from yourself.

shortcut.navigation:
Change current shortcuts set
[Middle Click] Setup automation

automation.title: Shortcuts Set ({set}) - Automation
automation.hint: If the effect currently exists on the actor or if the macro returns true, this shortcuts set will automatically be used.
automation.zero: The first shortcuts set cannot have any automation.

delete.title: Delete Macro
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this macro?

resolve.full: {name} is full of stamina and doesn't need to rest.

breather.label: Take a Breather
breather.hint: Rest for 10 minutes, spend a resolve point and regain all your stamina.

steel.hint: Use an action, spend a resolve point and regain half your stamina.
